import { useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import ItemCount from "../ItemCount/ItemCount" const ItemDetail = ({ img, name, stock, precio, descripcion, category, setCart }) => { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(0) console.log(setCart) const onAdd = (quantity) => { setQuantity(quantity) setCart({id, name, precio, quantity}) } return( <>

Detalle

{name}

Precio: ${precio}

Descripcion: {descripcion}

Categoria: {category}

Stock: {stock}

{quantity > 0 ? : }
) } export default ItemDetail
